parameters: Hi, sis... Sorry you've been dragged into all this...
This is a dangerous quest and all that...
Could you maybe tell me... about your eye?
How about I tell you when you get the Orbs, okay?
I met her in Valua. She said to give you her regards.
Did you hire her to do something, sis...?
...When you're Queen, you're sometimes forced to make some questionable choices for the greater good.
And with Parliament breathing down my neck...

\!
Well, Sirius could do the job I needed done.
What did you have her do...?
I'm really sorry, sis, but I can't tell you...

\!
Um... \.how about when I tell you about my eye?
Welcome back, sis! How is your quest going?
I wish I could help more, but... The Parliament has my hands tied...
Not only that, but I've had to make several diplomatic trips lately...
Guess we're both bound to our duties, huh?
Welcome back! ...Are you taking good care of \N[1]?
She might be in over her head... But I think she can do it! Especially with your help!
Welcome back! ...Are you taking good care of \N[1]?
She might be in over her head... But I think she can do it! Especially with your help!
Don't forget about our deal, all right~?

\!
Once all this is over, come to Mt. Pleasant...
We'll show these servile fools what it means to truly be Queens...

\!
Say, sis... Can you tell me about Sirius now?
...Well, I realized early on that if I wanted to make something like Mt. Pleasant, I would need something more than just regular hypnosis.
I pored through the royal library until I found a book that said the White Jewel in particular has the power of \C[8]Control\C[0].
I used every means I had to find out where it was.

\!
At one point, it was guarded by the Anu in the Tomb of Luxatep in West Beach, but it was stolen.
It turns out that the woman who stole it didn't even realize what it really was.

\!
She was just a run-of-the-mill treasure hunter.
So... I hired Sirius to track her down.

\!
And when someone has the gold to send the White Wolf after you, there's no more hiding. I got the White Jewel.

\!
Let's just say there's one very "special" Labor Golem in Mt. Pleasant who's just like all the rest now...
Welcome back! Is \N[1] doing all right?
Don't forget... to remind her of my offer~
Welcome back! Is \N[1] doing all right?
Don't forget... to remind her of my offer~
Wh- What are you doing on the throne?!
...Oh, this? Why, this is merely a formality.
It was so heartbreaking to learn of Her Majesty's...
But, as I understand it, justice was taken into the hands of the royal family, hm?
Well, regardless, with the Queen indisposed and the Princess unable to take the throne due to prior obligations, Gianna has found itself in what's known as an "Interregnum."
And, as the law of our great nation states, when in an Interregnum, the nation will be led by the Parliament.
...Why am I sitting on the throne, you ask?
It was so heartbreaking to learn of Her Majesty's...
But, as I understand it, justice was taken into the hands of the royal family, hm?
Well, regardless, with the Queen indisposed and the Princess unable to take the throne due to prior obligations, Gianna has found itself in what's known as an "Interregnum."
And, as the law of our great nation states, when in an Interregnum, the nation will be led by the Parliament.
...Why am I sitting on the throne, you ask?
It was so heartbreaking to learn of Her Majesty's...
But, as I understand it, justice was taken into the hands of the royal family, hm?
Well, regardless, with the Queen indisposed and the Princess unable to take the throne due to prior obligations, Gianna has found itself in what's known as an "Interregnum."
And, as the law of our great nation states, when in an Interregnum, the nation will be led by the Parliament.
...There is, of course, a way for you to regain control of the now-empty throne.
If you complete your task and retrieve the Orbs...

\!
Then the Princess of Gianna will be under no "prior obligations" and can succeed her sister.

\!
Our plan is still in motion. Either you return with the Orbs and bring prosperity to all of Gianna...
...Or you fail, and we can finally throw away this musty old chair.
...There is, of course, a way for \N[1] to regain control of the now-empty throne.
If you complete your task and retrieve the Orbs...

\!
Then the Princess of Gianna will be under no "prior obligations" and can succeed her sister.

\!
Our plan is still in motion. Either you return with the Orbs and bring prosperity to all of Gianna...
...Or you fail, and we can finally throw away this musty old chair.
...There is, of course, a way for \N[1] to regain control of the now-empty throne.
If you complete your task and retrieve the Orbs...

\!
Then the Princess of Gianna will be under no "prior obligations" and can succeed her sister.

\!
Our plan is still in motion. Either you return with the Orbs and bring prosperity to all of Gianna...
...Or you fail, and we can finally throw away this musty old chair.
Oh my, if it isn't the Princess!
Well, well. It's the royal lapdogs, if I'm not mistaken.
Well, well. It's the royal lapdogs, if I'm not mistaken.
Have you retrieved the Orbs yet?
You're not looking to weasel you way out of your duties by becoming maids, are you~?

\!
Madame Yterre is notoriously wary of those she doesn't consider her servants.
Luckily for you, I'm clever enough for all of us.
With that, you *should* be able to fool her maids, at least. That should get you in.
Oh, no need to thank me~

\!
You can repay me by bringing me those Orbs, though...
\lsoffTo Fast Travel, go to the menu and select "Travel," then your destination.

\!
Glad to see you've returned for another go!
\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiAnyway, since you've returned, want to shake things up a bit? \!I do love a healthy dose of chaos~ â™«
\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiAll right~! I've got a few different options for you, so just ask about them and I'll explain!
\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiWith \C[3]"Random Treasure Mode," \C[14]every treasure chest that normally contains a non-unique item will give you something at random instead!
\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiWith \C[3]"Random Keys Mode," \C[14]the locations of every unique item will be shuffled around!
\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiIn other words, you might find a Spellbook for the Forsaken Tower in the City of Mists, or find the Chest of Maid Outfits in the Tower!

\!
The Jewels and Tomes won't be affected, though.
\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiWith \C[3]"Mystery Shop Mode," \C[14]all shops will have their inventories replaced with a "Mystery Box" item that costs 1,000 Gold and gives you a random item on use.
\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiYou'll still be able to sell items to Traveller and buy Elixirs from the Draining Witch, however.

\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiWith \C[3]"Stat Modifier Mode," \C[14]every party member will receive two permanent passive skills - one that increases a random stat by 25% and one that decreases a random stat by 25%.
\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiMax HP and Max Lust won't be affected, though.

\!
You didn't actually activate any of them!!
\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiDid you change your mind or something?
No, let me see the options again.
\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiFine, then. I'll see you later in my Realm, probably.

\!
If you change your mind, start a new file and I'll be here.
No, let me see the options again.
\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiVery good~! I'm glad you like spicing things up~ â™«
\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiWell, I'm going to head off to my Realm now.

\!
Try to at least make it that far, all right~?
\C[14]\lsn<Saint5>\lspi[150]\fiFine, then. I'll see you later in my Realm, probably.

\!
If you change your mind, start a new file and I'll be here.
Terribly sorry... Her Majesty is on a diplomatic mission of great importance.
She shall return in due time.
Terribly sorry... Her Majesty is on a diplomatic mission of great importance.
She shall return in due time.
We must finalize that trade agreement with Sea Market!
They are an important asset to our coffers...
After the upheaval in Sea Market, I wonder about the future of our lucrative trade deal...
I understand that Sea Market was being run by a cabal of shadowy councilors, but they were actually quite efficient!
The Orc problem is only growing worse... There are still reports of Giannan travellers being impregnated by Orcs in the Tabnath Mountains...
I can hardly believe it... Queen Butin'Bak, defeated by a Giannan royal envoy!
...And we didn't take the advantage to occupy Tabnath?!
Tabnath is under Giannan control and Orcs are being subjugated en masse...
I could hardly imagine a better outcome!
New Rokkas is steadily growing more and more formidable...
They are certainly allies... but we must consider for how long...
There's been some talk of a power vacuum in New Rokkas!
How peculiar... Might you know anything about it?

\!
This could be the opportunity we've been waiting for...

\!
(If you haven't beaten the game before and found this by accident, it's highly recommended that you don't use the Randomizer options on your first playthrough.)
\lsoffGet ALL items x99? (May include bugged / nonexistent or nonimplemented ones)
You had the opportunity to seize Tabnath - something we've been trying to covertly accomplish for decades - no, *centuries*, really - and you didn't take it?
We can just conquer them later.
We can just conquer them later.
This purely idiotic move only proves to me that the monarchy must go at some point.

\!
Someone as incompetent as you inherits the throne, and then what? Gianna gets to be destroyed?
...Well, you're still obligated by law to bring us the Orbs.

\!
I just need to remind myself that I've already won.
Forge onward and get the rest of the Orbs!
\>Forge onward and get the rest of the Orbs!
\lsoffThe Red Tome is now in your possession! \|\|\|\|\|\|\|

\!
I am Maritus, Lady Lyra's butler, as you may recall.
Lady Lyra is ready for you now.
